job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // Azure // Remote
job.description: A Software Development company that develops mobile threat defense software solutions is looking to bring on a talented Site Reliability Engineer. You'd be joining their Dallas-based team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives.<br><br>As an SRE, you'll be focused primarily on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline, and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems.<br><br><strong><u>Skills &amp; Experience<br></u></strong><ul> <li>4+ years of experience in a DevOps/SRE environment </li> <li>Azure DevOps</li> <li>Experience working in both Azure and AWS environments is highly preferred</li> <li>Proficient in Java and/or Powershell scripting </li> <li>Working knowledge of Terraform and Ansible</li> <li>Docker/Kubernetes </li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>The Offer<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Competitive Salary: Up to $155K/year, DOE</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>You Will Receive The Following Benefits<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Medical, Dental, Vision</li> <li>401(k)</li> <li>Casual work environment </li> <li>Full remote work option</li> <br></ul><em>Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.<br><br></em><strong>Posted By:</strong> Carolyn Regimbal<br><br>
